Info: Value 1 indicates the SCOPE will use the lite SCOPEversion
Value 1 indicates that SCOPE will calculate thechlorophyll fluorescence in observation direction
Value 1 SCOPE will calculate the spectrum of thermal radiation
Value 1 indicates the SCOPE includes simulation of reflectance dependence on de-epoxydation state
Value 0 use a soil reflectance file and  Value 1 SCOPE will calculate the soil spectrum using BSM model
Value 0 empirical with sustained NPQ from Flexas data and Value 1 empirical with sigmoid for Kn and Value 2 uses Magnani 2012 model
Value 1 indicates that SCOPE will correct the Vcmax and rate constants for temperature in biochemical.m
Value 1 indicates that SCOPE will check with field data
Value 1 indicates that SCOPE wil use the mSCOPE considering vertical variations in the vegetation canopies
Value 0 the SCOPE will execute by individual runs based on LUT table and Value 1 for time series (uses text files with meteo input as time series)
Value 1 calculate full BRDF for many angles
Value 1  indicates that SCOPE will estimate vertical profiles
Value 0 will estimate the GAM parameters with Soil_Inertia0(lambdas) and Value 1 will estimate the GAM with Soil_Inertia1(SMC) and Value 2 will estimate  G by 0.35*Rn where always in no TS
Value 0 is fixed and Value 1 is calculated
Value 1 indicates that SCOPE wil use the MoninObukhov correction
Value 1 SCOPE wil estimate LIDF from angles file and Value 0 will use LIDFa and LIDFb from LUT table for estimating LIDF
Value 0 use a the irradiance file from SCOPE model Value 1 use irradiance measurements WithE and Value 2 use irradiance from MODTRAN atmospheric.file
